U

update(List<Location>, EntityManager) - Static method in class servlets.LocationServlet
Method to update locations in the database; all information will be updated, there is no check if only some attributes have changed
update(List<Route>, EntityManager) - Static method in class servlets.RouteServlet
Method to update routes in the database
updateAvgLocationRating(Location) - Static method in class servlets.FeedbackServlet
Method to calculate the new average rating of a location as soon as anything has changed
updateAvgRouteRating(Route) - Static method in class servlets.FeedbackServlet
Method to calculate the new average rating of a route as soon as anything has changed
updateLocationFeedback(EntityManager, int, List<Feedback>, HttpSession) - Static method in class servlets.FeedbackServlet
Method to update feedback of a location
updateRouteFeedback(EntityManager, int, List<Feedback>, HttpSession) - Static method in class servlets.FeedbackServlet
Method to update feedback of a route

username - Variable in class model.Users
